title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When starting the workbench, the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list does not display any files.
EB: The MRU list should display the files that were opened in previous sessions.
SR:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
